name: Sony PS4 Slim Console (1TB)
detail:
Brand New stock. Local stock with one year warranty by Sony. 
Includes a new slim 1TB PlayStation4 system, a matching DualShock 4 Wireless Controller.
Include 3 best selling games- God of war, Detriot become human, last of us
English/Regional language setting/menu selectable
No region lock. Asia, US, Europe any game titles all playable
Play online with your friends, get free games, save games online and more with PlayStation Plus membership (sold separately
Connect with your friends to broadcast and celebrate your epic moments at the press of the Share button to Twitch, YouTube, Facebook and Twitter

name: Nintendo Switch Lite - Zacian and Zamazenta Edition
detail: Introducing the Nintendo Switch Lite Zacian and Zamazenta Edition system, a new addition to the Nintendo Switch family to be launched on Nov. 8.
